analyzed: vyatireka ātmikā vyāptiḥ ākṣipta anvaya rūpiṇī
baidhamyā eva iti dṛṣṭānte sattve hetoḥ iha ucyate

original: yatsattat kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ santaścāmīvivādāspadībhūtāḥ padārthā iti svabhāvo hetuḥ /
analyzed: yat sat tat kṣaṇikam yathā ghaṭaḥ santaḥ ca amī vivāda āspadībhūtāḥ padārthāḥ iti svabhāvaḥ hetuḥ
na tāvat asya asidviḥ sambhavati
yathāyogam pratyakṣa anumāṇa pramāṇa pratīte dharmmiṇi sattva śabdena abhipretasya arthakriyā kāri tva lakṣaṇasya sādhanasya pramāṇa samadhigata tvāt
na ca virudva anaikāntika te
vyāpaka anupalambha ātmanā viparyyaya bādhaka pramāṇena vyāpteḥ prasādhanāt
byāpakam ca arthakriyā kāri tvasya kramākrami kāryya viṣaya tvam eva

original: na punaḥ kāraṇagatau kāryyagatau vā kramākramāvasya vyāpakau /
analyzed: na punar kāraṇa gatau kāryya gatau vā kramākramau asya vyāpakau
kṛtvā karaṇa lakṣaṇasya kramasya kṣaṇike sambhavāt
kāryya gatābhyām krama akramābhyām kāraṇa śakteḥ vyāpta yogāt

original: tasmāt kāraṇagatayā kramākramikāryyaviṣayatayā vyāpyamānā kāraṇaśaktiḥ kramākramavyāptetyucyate /
analyzed: tasmāt kāraṇa gatayā kramākrami kāryya viṣaya tayā vyāpyamānā kāraṇa śaktiḥ kramākrama vyāptā iti ucyate
viṣayeṇa viṣayi nirddeśāt
vyavahāra lāghava artham

original: tataśca yadyapi sarvvatra kramākramau sattvasya vyāpakāvityādyucyate /
analyzed: tatas ca yadi api sarvvatra kramākramau sattvasya vyāpakau ityādi ucyate
tathā api kramākrami kāryya viṣaya tvam eva vyāpakam
nanu yadā ekam eva kāryyam aṅkura ādikam utpadyate
tadā katham kāryya gata kramākrama vyavasthā iti ced
ucyate yadi api ekam eva kāryyam bhinna kāla kāryyam apekṣya kramaḥ tad abhāvāt ca akramaḥ stad kāri tvam eva kramākrama kāri tvam
tathā api apekṣaṇīya viṣaya bhedāt kramākramayoḥ asāṅkaryyam eva
pitṛ putra tva vat

original: kaḥ punarasau vyāptiprasādhako vyāpakānupalambha iti cet /
analyzed: kaḥ punar asau vyāpti prasādhakaḥ vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ iti ced
ucyate
yasya kramākrami kāryya viṣaya tvat na asti
na tat śaktam
yathā śaśaviṣāṇam

original: nāsti ca nityābhimatasya bhāvasya kramākramikāryyaviṣayatvamiti vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
analyzed: na asti ca nitya abhimatasya bhāvasya kramākrami kāryya viṣaya tvam iti vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ
na tāvat ayam asidvaḥ vaktavyaḥ

original: nityasya dharmmiṇaḥ kramākramikāryyaviṣayatvena vyāpakena saha virodhasadbhāvāt,
analyzed: nityasya dharmmiṇaḥ kramākrami kāryya viṣaya tvena vyāpakena saha virodha sadbhāvāt

original: tathā hi pūrvvāparakālayorekatve nityatvaṃ kṣaṇadvayepi bhede kramākramitvaṃ /
analyzed: tathā hi pūrvva apara kālayoḥ eka tve nitya tvam kṣaṇa dvaye pi bhede kramākrami tvam
tatas ca nitya tvam kramākrami tvam ca iti abhinna tvam bhinna tvam ca iti uktam bhavati
etayoḥ ca paraspara parihāra sthiti lakṣaṇa tayā virodhaḥ
tat katham nitye kramākrama sambhavaḥ
na api virudvaḥ sapakṣe bhāvāt
na ca anaikāntikaḥ
kramākrama abhāvasya arthakriyā sāmarthya abhāvena vyāpta tvāt

original: tathā hi na tāvat kramākramābhyāmanyaḥ prakārosti,
analyzed: tathā hi na tāvat kramākramābhyām anyaḥ prakāraḥ usti
yena arthakriyā sambhāvanāyām kāramā kramābhyām arthakriyā vyāptiḥ na syāt
tasmāt artha kriyā mātra anubadva tayā tayoḥ anyatara prakārasya
ubhayoḥ abhāve ca abhāvāt arthakriyā mātrasya iti tābhyām tasya vyāpti sidviḥ
pakṣīkṛte ca tayoḥ abhāvena arthakriyā śakti abhāva sidvau katham anekāntaḥ
na hi byāpya vyāpakayoḥ vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva sidvi mudvūya byāpya abhāvena vyāpaka abhāvasya vyāpti sidvau
upāya antaram asti iti niravadyaḥ vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ
sattvasya kṣaṇika tvena vyāptim sādhayati eva
nanu vyāpaka anupalambhataḥ sattvasya katham sva sādhya prativandha sidviḥ
asya api aneka doṣa duṣṭa tvāt

original: tathāhi na tāvadayaṃ prasaṅgo hetuḥ sādhyadharmmiṇi pramāṇasidvatvāt,
analyzed: tathā hi na tāvat ayam prasaṅgaḥ hetuḥ sādhya dharmmiṇi pramāṇa sidva tvāt
para abhyupagama sidva tva abhāvāt
viparyyaya paryyavasāna abhāvāt ca
atha svatantraḥ
tad āśraya asidvaḥ
akṣaṇikasya āśrayasya asambhavāt apratīta tvāt vā

original: pratīti rhi pratyakṣeṇānumānena vikalpamātreṇa vā syāt /
analyzed: pratītiḥ rhi pratyakṣeṇa anumānena vikalpa mātreṇa vā syāt

original: prathamapakṣadvaye sākṣātpāramparyyeṇa vā svapratītilakṣaṇārthakāritve maulaḥ sādhāraṇo hetuḥ /

analyzed: vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ ca svarūpa asidvaḥ syāt
arthakriyā kāri tve kramākramayoḥ anyatarasya avaśyambhāvāt

original: antimapakṣe tu na kaścidveturanāśrayaḥ syāt vikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sulabhatvāt /
analyzed: antima pakṣe tu na kaścid vetuḥ anāśrayaḥ syāt vikalpa mātra sidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sulabha tvāt

original: api ca tat kalpanājñānaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi vā syāt,
analyzed: api ca tat kalpanā jñānam pratyakṣa pṛṣṭha bhāvi vā syāt
liṅga janma vā
saṃskāra jam vā
sandigdha vastukam vā
avastukam vā
tatra ādya pakṣa dvaye kṣaṇikasya sattā eva abyāhatā katham vādhaka avatāraḥ
tṛtīye tu na sarvvadā kṣaṇika sattā niṣedhaḥ
tad arpita saṃskāra abhāve tat smaraṇa ayogāt
caturthe tu sandigdha āśraya tvam hetu doṣaḥ

original: pañcame ca tadviṣayasyābhāvo na tāvat pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati /
analyzed: pañcame ca tad viṣayasya abhāvaḥ na tāvat pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati
akṣaṇika ātmanaḥ sarvvadā eva tvad mate pratyakṣa tvāt
na ca anumānataḥ tad abhāvaḥ
pratibadva liṅga anupalambhāt iti āśraya asidviḥ tāvat udvatā
evam dṛṣṭāntaḥ api pratihantavyaḥ
svarūpa asidvaḥ api ayam hetuḥ sthirasya api kramākrami sahakāri apekṣayā krama akramābhyām artha kriyā upapatteḥ
nā api krama yaugapadya pakṣa ukta doṣa prasaṅgaḥ
tathā hi krami sahakāri apekṣayā krami kāryya kāri tvam tāvat avirudvam
tathā ca śaṅkarasya saṃkṣiptaḥ yam abhiprāyaḥ
sahakāri sākalyam hi sāmarthyam
tad vaikalyam ca asāmarthyam
na ca tayoḥ āvirbhāva tirobhāvābhyām tadvataḥ kācid kṣatiḥ
tasya tābhyām anya tvāt
tat katham sahakāriṇaḥ na apekṣya kāryya karaṇa prasaṅgaḥ iti
trilocanasya api ayam saṃkṣipta arthaḥ
kāryyam eva hi sahakāriṇam apekṣate
na kāryya utpatti hetuḥ
yasmāt dvividham sāmarthyat nijam āgantukam ca sahakāri antaram
kṣaṇikasya api kramavat sahakāri nānātvāt api kramavat kāryya nānātva upapatteḥ aśakyam bhāvānām pratikṣaṇam anya anya tvam upapādayitum iti
nyāyabhūṣaṇaḥ pi lapati
prathama kāryya utpādana kāle hi uttara kāryya utpādana svabhāvaḥ

original: ataḥ prathamakāla evāśe ṣāṇi kāryyāṇi kuryyāditi cet /
analyzed: atas prathama kāle eva āśe ṣāṇi kāryyāṇi kuryyāt iti ced
tat idam mātā me vandhyā ityādi vat sva vacana virodhāt ayuktam
yaḥ hi uttara kāryya janana svabhāvaḥ sa katham ādau tat kāryyam kuryyāt
na tarhi tad kāryya karaṇa svabhāvaḥ
nahi nīla utpādana svabhāvaḥ pīta ādikam api karoti iti
vācaspatiḥ api paṭhati
nanu ayam akṣaṇikaḥ sva rūpeṇa kāryyan janayati

original: taccāsya svarūpaṃ tṛtīyādiṣviva kṣaṇeṣu dvitīye 'pi kṣaṇe saditi tadāpi janayet /
analyzed: tat ca asya svarūpam tṛtīya ādiṣu iva kṣaṇeṣu dvitīye kṣaṇe sat iti tadā api janayet
a kurvan vā tṛtīya ādiṣu api na kurvīta
tasya tādavasthyāt
atādavasthye vā tat eva asya kṣaṇika tvam

original: atrocyate / satyaṃ svarūpeṇa kāryyañjanayati na tu tenaiva /
analyzed: atra ucyate satyam sva rūpeṇa kāryyan janayati na tu tena eva
sahakāri sahitāt eva tatas kāryya utpatti darśanāt
tasmāt vyāpti vat kāryya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ pi ekatra anya yoga vyavacchedena amyatra ayoga vyavacchedena avabodvavyaḥ
tathā eva lokika parīkṣakāṇām sampratipatteḥ iti na krami kāryya kāri tva pakṣa ukta doṣa avasaraḥ
na api akṣaṇike yaugapadya pakṣa ukta doṣa avakāśaḥ

original: ye hi kāryyamutpāditavanto dravyaviśeṣāsteṣāṃ vyāpārasya niyatakāryyotpādanasamarthasya niṣpādite kāryye 'nuvarttamāneṣvapi teṣu dravyeṣu nivṛttārthādūnā  #
analyzed: ye hi kāryyam utpāditavantaḥ dravya viśeṣāḥ teṣām vyāpārasya niyata kāryya utpādana samarthasya niṣpādite kāryye nuvarttamāneṣu api teṣu dravyeṣu nivṛtta arthāt ūnā  /
sāmagrī jāyate
tat katham niṣpāditam niṣpādayiṣyati

original: na hi daṇḍādayaḥ svabhāvenaiva karttāro yenāmī niṣpatterārabhya kāryyaṃ vidadyuḥ /
analyzed: na hi daṇḍa ādayaḥ svabhāvena eva karttāraḥ yena amī niṣpatteḥ ārabhya kāryyam vidadyuḥ
kintarhi vyāpāra āveśinaḥ

original: na ceyatā svarūpeṇa na karttāraḥ svarūpakārakatvanirvvāhaparatayā vyāpārasamāveśāditi //
analyzed: na ca iyatā sva rūpeṇa na karttāraḥ sva rūpa kāraka tva nirvvāha para tayā vyāpāra samāveśāt iti

original: kiñca kramākramābhāvaśca bhaviṣyati na ca satvābhāva iti sandigdhavyatirekopyayaṃ vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
analyzed: kiñca kramākrama abhāvaḥ ca bhaviṣyati na ca sattva abhāvaḥ iti sandigdha vyatirekaḥ upi ayam vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ
na hi kramākramābhyām anya prakārasya abhāvaḥ sidvaḥ
viśeṣa niṣedhasya śeṣa abhyanujñā viṣaya tvāt
kiñca prakāra antarasya dṛśya tvena atyanta niṣedhaḥ

original: adṛśyatve tu nāsattāniścayo viprakarṣiṇāmiti na kramākramābhyāmarthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptisidviḥ /
analyzed: adṛśya tve tu na asattā niścayaḥ viprakarṣiṇām iti na krama akramābhyām artha kriyā sāmarthyasya vyāpti sidviḥ
atas sandigdha vyatirekaḥ pi vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ

original: kiñca dṛśyādṛśyasahakāripratyayasākalyavataḥ kramayaugapadyasyātyantaparokṣatvāt tena vyāptaṃ sattvamapi parokṣameveti na tāvatpratibandhaḥ  #
analyzed: kiñca dṛśya adṛśya sahakāri pratyaya sākalyavataḥ krama yaugapadyasya atyanta parokṣa tvāt tena vyāptam sattvam api parokṣam eva iti na tāvat pratibandhaḥ  /
pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati na api anumānataḥ
tad pratibadva liṅga abhāvāt iti
api ca kramākramābhyām arthakriyā kāri tvam vyāptam iti ati subhāṣitam
yadi krameṇa vyāptam katham akrameṇa
atha akrameṇa na tarhi krameṇa

original: kramākramābhyāṃ vyāptamiti tu brūvata vyāpterevābhāvaḥ pradarśito bhavati /
analyzed: krama akramābhyām vyāptam iti tu vyāpteḥ eva abhāvaḥ pradarśitaḥ bhavati
nahi bhavati
agniḥ dhūma bhāva abhāvābhyām vyāptaḥ iti
atas vyāpteḥ anaikāntika tvam

original: api ca kimidaṃ vādhakamakṣaṇikānāmasattāṃ sādha yati,
analyzed: api ca kim idam vādhakam akṣaṇikānām asattām sādha yati
utasvid
akṣaṇikāt sattvasya vyatirekam
atha sattva kṣaṇikatvayoḥ prativandham
na pūrvaḥ vikalpaḥ
ukta krameṇa hetoḥ āśraya asidva tvāt
na ca dvitīyaḥ

original: sā ca yadi pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate tadā tadvetuḥ syāditi sattvamanaikāntikaṃ /
analyzed: sā ca yadi pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate tadā tad vetuḥ syāt iti sattvam anaikāntikam
vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ svarūpa asidvaḥ
atha sā vikalpyate

original: tadā pūrvvoktakrameṇa pañcadhā vikalpya vikalpyo dūṣaṇīyaḥ /
analyzed: tadā pūrvva ukta krameṇa pañcadhā vikalpya vikalpyaḥ dūṣaṇīyaḥ
atas eva na tṛtiyaḥ api vikalpaḥ
vyatireka asidvau sambandha asidveḥ
kiñca na bhū tala vat atra akṣaṇikaḥ dharmmī dṛśyate

original: na ca svabhāvānupalambhe vyāpakānupalambhaḥ kasyacit dṛśyasya pratipattimantareṇāntarbhāvayituṃ śakya iti /
analyzed: na ca svabhāva anupalambhe vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ kasyacid dṛśyasya pratipattim antareṇa antarbhāvayitum śakyaḥ iti
kiñca asya abhāva dharmma tve
āśrayā sidva tvam itaretara āśraya tvañca
bhāva dharmma tve virudva tvañca
ubhaya dharmma tve ca anaikāntika tvam iti na trayīn doṣa jātim atipatati
yat punar uktam akṣaṇika tve karma yaugapadyābhyām arthakriyā virodhāt iti
tatra virodha sidvim anusaratā virodhī api pratipattabyaḥ
tad pratīti nāntarīyaka tvāt virodha sidveḥ

original: yathā tuhinadahanayoḥ sāpekṣadhruvabhāvayośca pratiyogī cākṣaṇikaḥ pratīyamānaḥ pratītikāritvāt sanneva syāt ajanakasyāprameyatvāt /
analyzed: yathā tuhina dahanayoḥ sāpekṣa dhruva bhāvayoḥ ca pratiyogī ca akṣaṇikaḥ pratīyamānaḥ pratīti kāri tvāt san eva syāt ajanakasya aprameya tvāt
saṃvṛtti sidvena akṣaṇika tvena virodha sidviḥ iti ced
saṃvṛti sidvam api vāstavam kālpanikam vā syāt
yadi vāstavam katham tasya asattvam katham ca arthakriyā virodhaḥ
arthakriyām vāstavam ucyate
atha kālpanikam

original: tatra kiṃ virodho vāstavaḥ kālpaniko vā /
analyzed: tatra kim virodhaḥ vāstavaḥ kālpanikaḥ vā
na tāvat vāstavaḥ kalpita virodhi virodha tvāt
bandhyā putra virodha vat
atha virodhaḥ pi kālpanikaḥ

original: na tarhi sattvasya vyatirekaḥ pāramārthika iti kṣaṇabhaṅgo dattajalāñjaliriti /
analyzed: na tarhi sattvasya vyatirekaḥ pāramārthikaḥ iti kṣaṇa bhaṅgaḥ datta jalāñjaliḥ iti
ayam eva codya prabandhaḥ smat gurubhiḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ
nityan nā asti na vā pratīti viṣayaḥ tena āśraya asiddha tā

original: hetoḥ svānubhavasya cākṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
analyzed: hetoḥ sva anubhavasya ca akṣatiḥ atas kṣiptaḥ ca

original: śūnyaśca dvitīyena sidhyati na cāsattāpi sattā yathā no nityena virodhasidvirasatā śakyā kramāderapīti //
analyzed: śūnyaḥ ca dvitīyena sidhyati na ca asattā api sattā yathā no nityena virodha sidviḥ asatā śakyā krama ādeḥ api iti

original: atrocyate / iha vastunyapi dharmmidharmmavyavahāro dṛṣṭoyathā gavi gotvaṃ,
analyzed: atrā ucyate iha vastuni api dharmmi dharma vyavahāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā gavi go tvam
paṭe śukla tvam turage gamanam ityādi

original: avastunyapi dharmmidharmmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā śaśaviṣāṇe tīkṣṇatvābhāvo bandhyāputre vakratvābhāvo gagaṇāravinde gandhābhāva ityādi /
analyzed: avastuni api dharmmi dharmma vyavahāraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ yathā śaśa viṣāṇe tīkṣṇa tva abhāvaḥ bandhyā putre vakra tva abhāvaḥ gagaṇa aravinde gandha abhāvaḥ ityādi
tatra avastuni dharmmi tvat na asti iti kim bastu dharmmeṇa dharmmi tvat na asti
āhosvit avastu dharmmeṇa api
prathama pakṣe sidva sādhanam dvitīya pakṣe tu sva vacana virodhaḥ
yat āhuḥ guravaḥ
dharmmasya vastuni
bādhā vidhi vyavahṛtiḥ kim iha asti no vā
kvāpi asti ced katham iyanti na dūṣaṇāni
na asti eva ced sva vacana pratirodha sidviḥ
avastunaḥ dharmmi tva svīkāra pūrvvaka tvasya vyāpakasya abhāve āśraya asidvi dūṣaṇasya anupanyāsa prasaṅgaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yenaiva hi vacanenāvastuno dharmmitvābhāvena dharmmeṇa dharmmatvamabhyupagataṃ /
analyzed: yena eva hi vacanena avastunaḥ dharmmi tva abhāvena dharmmeṇa dharmma tvam abhyupagatam
paraḥ tu pratiṣidhyate iti

original: tathāhyavastuno dharmmitvannāstīti vacanena dharmmitvābhāvaḥ kimavastu vidhīyate,
analyzed: tathā hi avastunaḥ dharmmi tvat na asti iti vacanena dharmmi tva abhāvaḥ kim avastu vidhīyate
anyatra vā
na vā kvacid api iti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ
dharmmi tva abhāvasya dharmmasya tatra eva vidhānāt
dvitīye vastuni kim āyātam
anyatra dharmmi tva abhāva vidhānāt

original: tṛtīyastu pakṣo vyartha eva nirāśrayatvāt iti kathamavastuno dharmmitvaniṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: tṛtīyaḥ tu pakṣaḥ vyarthaḥ eva nirāśraya tvāt iti katham avastunaḥ dharmmi tva niṣedhaḥ
tasmāt yathā pramāṇa upanyāsaḥ prameya svīkāra pūrvvaka tvena vyāptaḥ
vācaka śabda upanyāsaḥ vā vācya svīkāra pūrvvaka tvena vyāptaḥ

original: tathāvastuno dharmmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanopanyāso 'vastuno dharmmitvasvīkārapūrvvatvena vyāptaḥ /
analyzed: tathā vastunaḥ dharmmi tvam nā asti iti vacana upanyāsaḥ vastunaḥ dharmmi tva svīkāra pūrvva tvena vyāptaḥ
anyathā tad vacana upanyāsasya vyartha tvāt
tat yadi vacana upanyāsaḥ vyāpya dharmmaḥ
tadā avastunaḥ dharmmi tva svīkāraḥ api vyāpaka dharmmaḥ durbbāraḥ
atha na vyāpaka dharmmaḥ

original: tadā vyāpyasyāpi vacanopanyāsasyāsambhava iti mūkataivātra balādāyāteti kathaṃ na svavacanavirodhasidviḥ /
analyzed: tadā vyāpyasya api vacana upanyāsasya asambhavaḥ iti mūka tā eva atra balāt āyātā iti katham na sva vacana virodha sidviḥ
na hi abrūvan param bodhayitum īśaḥ

original: bruvan vā doṣamimaṃ pariharttumiti mahati saṅkaṭe praveśaḥ /
analyzed: bruvan vā doṣam imam pariharttum iti mahati saṅkaṭe praveśaḥ

original: avastuprastāve sahṛdayāṇāṃ mūkataiva yujyata iti cet /
analyzed: avastu prastāve sahṛdayāṇām mūka tā eva yujyate iti ced
aho mahat vaidagdhyam

original: avastuprastāve svayameva yathāśakti valgitvā bhagno mūkataiva nyāyaprāpteti paribhāṣayā niḥsarttumicchati /
analyzed: avastu prastāve svayam eva yathāśakti valgitvā bhagnaḥ mūka tā eva nyāya prāptā iti paribhāṣayā niḥsarttum icchati

original: nacāvastuprastāvo rājadaṇḍena vinā caraṇamarddanādināniṣṭimātreṇa vā pratiṣedvuṃ śakyate /
analyzed: na ca avastu prastāvaḥ rāja daṇḍena vinā caraṇa marddana ādinā aniṣṭi mātreṇa vā pratiṣedvum śakyate

original: tataścātrāpi kramākramābhāvasya sādhanatve sattvābhāvasya ca sādhyatve sandigdhavastubhāvasyāvastyātmano vā kṣaṇikasya dharmmitvaṃ kena pratihanyate
analyzed: tatas ca atra api kramākrama abhāvasya sādhana tve sattva abhāvasya ca sādhya tve sandigdha vastu bhāvasya avastyātmanaḥ vā kṣaṇikasya dharmmi tvam kena pratihanyate

original: trividho hi dharmmo dṛṣṭaḥ kaścidvastuniyato nīlādiḥ /
analyzed: trividhaḥ hi dharmmaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ kaścit vastu niyataḥ nīla ādiḥ
kaścid avastu niyataḥ yathā sarvva upākhyā virahaḥ
kaścid ubhaya sādhāraṇaḥ yathā anupalabdhi mātram
tatra vastu dharmmeṇa avastunaḥ dharmmi tva niṣedhaḥ iti yuktam
na tu avastu dharmmeṇa
vastu avastu dharmmeṇa vā
sva vacanasya iti arkṣāṇakasya abhāve sandehe vā avastu dharmmeṇa dharmmi tvam avyāhatam iti na ayam āśraya asidvaḥ vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ
akṣaṇika apratītāḥ vayam ā śraya asidvaḥ hetuḥ iti tu yuktam uktam
tad apratītau tad vyavahāra ayogāt

original: kevalamasau vyavahārāṅgabhūtā pratīti rvastvavastunorekarūpā na bhavati /
analyzed: kevalam asau vyavahāra aṅga bhūtā pratītiḥ rvastu avastunoḥ ekarūpā na bhavati
sākṣāt pāramparyyeṇa vastu sāmarthya bhāvinī hi vastu pratītiḥ
yathā pratyakṣam anumānam pratyakṣa pṛṣṭhabhāvī ca vikalpaḥ
avastunaḥ tu sāmarthya abhāvāt vikalpa mātram eva pratītiḥ

original: vastuno hi vastubalabhāvinī pratīti ryathāsākṣātpratyakṣaṃ paramparayā tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī vikalpo 'numānañca /
analyzed: vastunaḥ hi vastu bala bhāvinī pratītiḥ ryathā sākṣāt pratyakṣam paramparayā tad pṛṣṭha bhāvī vikalpaḥ numānam ca
avastunaḥ tu na vastu bala bhāvinī pratītiḥ tad kāraka tvena avastu tva hāni prasaṅgāt
tasmāt vikalpa mātram eva avastunaḥ pratītiḥ

original: nahyabhāvaḥ kaścidvigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkarttavyo 'pi tu vyavaharttavyaḥ /
analyzed: na hi abhāvaḥ kaścid vigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkarttavyaḥ tu vyavaharttavyaḥ
sa ca vyavahāraḥ vikalpāt api sidhyati eva
anyathā sarbba jana prasidvaḥ vastu vyavahāraḥ na syāt
iṣyate ca tad varmi tva pratiṣedha anuvandhāt iti akārakena api vikalpa mātra sidvaḥ kṣaṇikaḥ svīkarttavyaḥ iti na ayam apratīta tvāt api āśraya asidvaḥ hetuḥ vaktavyaḥ

original: tataścākṣaṇikasya vikalpamātrasidvatve yaduktaṃ na kaścidveturanāśrayaḥ syadvikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sulabhatvāditi tatasaṅgataṃ
analyzed: tatas ca akṣaṇikasya vikalpa mātra sidva tve yat uktam na kaścid vetuḥ anāśrayaḥ syat vikalpa mātra sidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sulabha tvāt iti

original: vikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sambhave 'pi vastudharmmeṇa dharmmitvāyogāt /
analyzed: vikalpa mātra sidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sambhave pi vastu dharmmeṇa dharmmi tva ayogāt
vastu dharmma hetu tva apekṣayā āśraya asidvasya api hetoḥ sambhavāt
yathā ātmanaḥ vibhu tva sādhana artham upanyastam sarvvatra upalabhyamāna guṇa tvāt iti sādhanam
vikalpaḥ ca ayam hetu upanyāsāt
pūrvvam sandigdha vastukaḥ
samarthite tu hetau avastukaḥ iti brūmaḥ
na ca atra sandigdha āśraya tvam nāma hetu doṣaḥ
āstāntāvat
sandigdhasya avastunaḥ api vikalpa mātra sidvasya avastu dharmma apekṣayā dharmmi tva prasādhanāt
vastu dharmma hetu tva apekṣayā eva sandigdha āśrayasya hetvābhāsasya vyavasthāpanāt
yathā iha nikuñje mayūraḥ kekāyitāt iti
avastuka vikalpa viṣayasya asattvantu vyāpaka anupalambhāt eva prasādhitam
evam dṛṣṭāntasya api vyoma ādeḥ dvarmmi tvam vikalpa mātreṇa pratītiḥ ca avagantavyā
tat evam avastu dharmma apekṣayā avastunaḥ dharmmi tvasya vikalpa mātreṇa pratīteḥ ca apanhotum aśakya tvāt na ayam āśraya asidvaḥ hetuḥ
na dṛṣṭānta kṣatiḥ
na ca eṣa svarūpa asidvaḥ
akṣaṇike dharmmiṇi krama akramayoḥ vyāpakayoḥ ayogāt

original: tathā hi yadi tasya prathame kṣaṇe dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvikāryyakāraṇasāmarthyamasti tadā prathamakṣaṇabhāvikāryyavat dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvyapi kāryyaṃ  #
analyzed: tathā hi yadi tasya prathame kṣaṇe dvitīya ādi kṣaṇa bhāvi kāryya kāraṇa sāmarthyam asti tadā prathama kṣaṇa bhāvi kāryya vat dvitīya ādi kṣaṇa bhāvi api kāryam
kuryyāt
samarthasya kṣepa ayogāt
atha tadā sahakāri sākalya lakṣaṇa sāmarthyam na asti
tad vaikalya lakṣaṇasya asāmarthyasya sambhavāt

original: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa karotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti /
analyzed: na hi bhāvaḥ sva rūpeṇa karoti iti sva rūpeṇa eva karoti
sahakāri sahitāt eva tatas kāryya utpatti darśanāt iti ced

original: yadā tāvadamī mīlitāḥ santaḥ kāryyaṃ kurvvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvameṣāmastu ko ni ṣedvā /
analyzed: yadā tāvat amī mīlitāḥ santaḥ kāryyam kurvvate tadā ekārtha karaṇa lakṣaṇam sahakāri tvam eṣām astu kaḥ ni set vā
militaiḥ eva tu tat kāryyam karttavyam iti kutas labhyate
pūrvva apara kālayoḥ eka svabhāva tvāt bhāvasya
sarvvadā janana ajananayoḥ anyatara niyama prasaṅgasya durvvāra tvāt
tasmāt sāmagrī janikā nā ekam janakam iti sthira vādinām manaḥ rājyasya api aviṣayaḥ
kim kurmaḥ dṛśyate tāvat evam iti ced

original: dṛśyatāṃ kintu pūrvvasthitādeva paścāt sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭādbhāvāt kāryyotpattiranyasmādeva viśiṣṭasāmagrīsamutpannāt kṣaṇāditi vivādapadametat
analyzed: dṛśyatām kintu pūrvva sthitāt eva paścāt sāmagrī madhya praviṣṭāt bhāvāt kāryya utpattiḥ anyasmāt eva viśiṣṭa sāmagrī samutpannāt kṣaṇāt iti vivāda padam etat

original: tatra prāgapi sambhave sarvvadaiva kāryyotpatte rnavā kadācidapīti virodhamasamādhāya tata eva kāryyotpattiriti sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ
analyzed: tatra prāk api sambhave sarvvadā eva kāryya utpatteḥ na vā kadācid api iti virodham a samādhāya tatas eva kāryya utpattiḥ iti sādhya anuvāda mātra pravṛttaḥ
na ca pratyabhijñānāt eva eka tva sidviḥ
tat pauruṣasya nirddalanāt

original: vistareṇa ca pratyabhijñānadūṣaṇamasmābhiḥ sthirasidvidūṣaṇe pratipāditamiti tata evāvadhāryyaṃ /
analyzed: vistareṇa ca pratyabhijñāna dūṣaṇam asmābhiḥ sthira sidvi dūṣaṇe pratipāditam iti tatas eva avadhāryyam
nanu kāryyam eva sahakāriṇam apekṣate
na tu kāryya utpatti hetuḥ
yasmāt dvividham sāmarthyam nijam āgantukam ca sahakāri antaram
kṣaṇikasya api krama vat sahakāri nānātvāt api kramavat kāryya nānātvam iti ced

original: bhavatu tāvannijāgantukabhedena dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tathāpi tatprātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ sadyaḥ kriyādharmmakamavaśyābhyupagantavyam /
analyzed: bhavatu tāvat nija āgantuka bhedena dvividham sāmarthyam tathā api tat prātisvikam vastu sva lakṣaṇam sadyas kriyā dharmmakam avaśya abhyupagantavyam
tat yadi prāk api
prāk api kāryya prasaṅgaḥ
atha paścāt eva na tadā śthirobhāvaḥ

original: na ca kāryyaṃ sahakāriṇo 'pekṣata iti yuktaṃ /
analyzed: na ca kāryyam sahakāriṇaḥ upekṣate iti yuktam
tasya a sattvāt

original: hetuśca sannapi yadi svakāryyannakaroti tadā tatkāryyameva tanna syāt,
analyzed: hetuḥ ca san api yadi sva kāryyan na karoti tadā tat kāryyam eva tat na syāt
svātantryāt
yat ca uktam
yaḥ hi uttara kāryya janana svabhāvaḥ sa katham ādau kāryyam kuryyāt
na tarhi tad kāryya karaṇa svabhāvaḥ
na hi nīla utpādana svabhāvaḥ pīta ādikam api karoti iti
tad asaṅgatam
sthira svabhāva tve bhāvasya uttara kālam eva idam kāryyat na apūrva kālam iti kutas etat
tad abhāvāt ca kāraṇam api uttara kāryya karaṇa svabhāvam iti api kutas

original: kiṃ kurmma uttarakālameva tasya janmeti cet /
analyzed: kim kurmmaḥ uttara kālam eva tasya janma iti ced
sthira tve tat anupapadyamānam asthira tām ādiśatu

original: śthiratve 'pyeṣa eva svabhāvastasya yaduttarakṣaṇa eva kāryyaṃ karotīti cet / na /
analyzed: śthira tve pi eṣaḥ eva svabhāvaḥ tasya yat uttara kṣaṇe eva kāryyam karoti iti ced na
pramāṇa vādhite svabhāva abhyupagama ayogāt iti na tāvat akṣaṇikasya krami kāryya kāri tvam asti
na api akrami kāryya kāri tva sambhavaḥ
dvitīye pi kṣaṇe kāraka svarūpa sadbhāve punar api kāryya karaṇa prasaṅgāt

original: kāryye niṣpanne tadviṣayavyāpārābhāvādūnā sāmagrī na niṣpāditaṃ niṣpādayediti cet / na /
analyzed: kāryye niṣpanne tad viṣaya vyāpāra abhāvāt ūnā sāmagrī na niṣpāditam niṣpādayet iti ced na

original: sāmagrīsambhavāsambhavayorapi sadyaḥ kriyākārakasvarūpasambhave janakatvamavāryyamiti prāgeva pratipādanāt /
analyzed: sāmagrī sambhava asambhavayoḥ api sadyas kriyā kāraka svarūpa sambhave janaka tvam avāryam iti prāk eva pratipādanāt

original: kāryyasya hi niṣpāditatvāt punaḥ karttumaśakyatvameva kāraṇamasamarthamāvedayati /
analyzed: kāryyasya hi niṣpādita tvāt punar karttum aśakya tvam eva kāraṇam asamartham āvedayati
tat ayam akṣaṇike kramākrami kāryya kāri tva abhāvaḥ na sidvaḥ

original: na ca kramākramābhyāmaparaprakārasambhavo yena tābhyāmavyāptau sandigdhavyatireko hetuḥ syāt /
analyzed: na ca krama akramābhyām apara prakāra sambhavaḥ yena tābhyām avyāptau sandigdha vyatirekaḥ hetuḥ syāt
prakāra antara śaṅkāyām tasya api dṛśya adṛśya tva prakāra dvaya dūṣaṇe sva pakṣe pi anāśvāsa prasaṅgāt
tasmāt anyaḥ nya vyavaccheda sthitayoḥ na aparaḥ prakāraḥ sambhavati
svarūpa apraviṣṭasya vastunaḥ

original: tathātīndriyasya sahakāriṇo 'dṛśyatvepyayogavyavacchedena dṛśyasahakārisahitasya dṛśyasyaiva sattvasya dṛśyakramākramābhyāṃ vyāptiḥ pratyakṣādeva  #
analyzed: tathā atīndriyasya sahakāriṇaḥ dṛśya tve pi ayoga vyavacchedena dṛśya sahakāri sahitasya dṛśyasya eva sattvasya dṛśya krama akramābhyām vyāptiḥ pratyakṣāt eva
sidhyati
evam krama akramābhyām arthakriyā kāri tvam byāptam iti krama akramayoḥ anyaḥ nya vyavacchedena sthita tvāt etad prakāra dvaya parihāreṇa arthakriyā kāri tvam anyatra
na gatam iti arthaḥ
atas eva etayoḥ vinivṛttau nivartteta
trilocanasya api vikalpa traye prathama dūṣaṇam āśraya asi dvi doṣa parihārataḥ nirastam
dvitīyam ca asaṅgatam vikalpa jñānena vyatirekasya pratīta tvāt

original: nahyabhāvaḥ kaścit vigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkarttavyo 'pi tu vikalpādeva vyavaharttavyaḥ /
analyzed: na hi abhāvaḥ kaścid vigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkarttavyaḥ upi tu vikalpāt eva vyavaharttavyaḥ
na hi abhāvasya vikalpāt anya apratipattiḥ apratipattiḥ vā sarvvathā ubhayathā api tad vyavahāra hāni prasaṅgāt

original: evaṃ vaidharmmyadṛṣṭāntasya hetuvyatirekasya ca vikalpādeva pratītiḥ /
analyzed: evam vaidharmmya dṛṣṭāntasya hetu vyatirekasya ca vikalpāt eva pratītiḥ
tṛtīyam api dūṣaṇam asaṅga tam
vyāpaka anupalambhe nirddoṣa tvasya kṣaṇika tvena vyāpteḥ avyāhata tvāt
tat ayam kṣaṇikasya asattvam

original: sattvasya tato vyatirekaṃ kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiñca sādhayatyekavyāpārātmakatvāt iti sthitaṃ /
analyzed: sattvasya tatas vyatirekam kṣaṇika tvena vyāptim ca sādhayati eka vyāpāra ātmaka tvāt iti sthitam

original: nanu vyāpakānupalabdhiriti yadyanupalabdhimātrantadā na tasya sādhyabudvijanakatvamavastutvāt /
analyzed: nanu vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ iti yadi anupalabdhi mātram tadā na tasya sādhya budvi janaka tvam avastu tvāt

original: na cānyopalabdhirvyāpakānupalabdhirabhidhātuṃ śakyā bhūtalādivat anyasya kasyacidanupalabdheriti cet tadasaṅgataṃ /
analyzed: na ca anya upalabdhiḥ vyāpakā anupalabdhiḥ abhidhātum śakyā bhū tala ādi vat anyasya kasyacid anupalabdheḥ iti ced tat asaṅgatam
dharmmi upalabdheḥ eva anyatra api anupalabdhi tayā vyavasthāpanāt

original: yathā neha śiṃśapā vṛkṣābhāvādityatra vṛkṣāpekṣayā kevalapradeśasya dharmmiṇa upalabdhirdṛśyānupalabdhiḥ /
analyzed: yathā na iha śiṃśapā vṛkṣa abhāvāt iti atra vṛkṣa apekṣayā kevala pradeśasya dharmmiṇaḥ upalabdhiḥ dṛśya anupalabdhiḥ

original: śiṃśapāpekṣayā ca kevalapradeśasya dharmmiṇa upalabdhireva śiṃśapābhāvopalabdhiriti svabhāvahetuparyyavasāyivyāpāro vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
analyzed: śiṃśapā apekṣayā ca kevala pradeśasya dharmmiṇaḥ upalabdhiḥ eva śiṃśapā bhāva upalabdhiḥ iti svabhāva hetu paryyavasāyi vyāpāraḥ vyāpaka anupalambhaḥ

original: tathā hi nityasya dharmmiṇo vikalpabudvyadhyavasi tasya kramikāritvākramikāritvāpekṣayā kevalagrahaṇameva kramikāritvā kramikāritvānupalambha  #
analyzed: tathā hi nityasya dharmmiṇaḥ tasya krami kāri tva akrami kāri tva apekṣayā kevala grahaṇam eva krami kāri tvā krami kāri tva anupalambha
arthakriyā apekṣayā ca
kevala pratītiḥ eva artha kriyā viyoga pratītiḥ iti vyāpaka anupalambha antarāt asya na kaścid viśeṣaḥ
adhyavasāya apekṣayā ca vāhye kṣaṇike vastuni vyāpaka abhāvāt vyāpya abhāva sidvi vyavahāraḥ
adhyavasāyaḥ ca samanantara pratyaya vala āyāta ākāra viśeṣa yogāt agṛhīte pi pravarttana śaktiḥ
īdṛśaḥ ca adhyavasāyaḥ rthaḥ smat citra advaita sidvau nirvvāhitaḥ
sa ca a visambādī vyavahāraḥ pariharttum aśakyaḥ
yat vyāpaka śūnyam
tat vā api a śūnyam iti
etasya eva arthasya anena api krameṇa pratipādanāt

original: ayañca nyāyo yathā vastubhūte dharmmiṇi tathāvastubhūte 'pīti ko viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: ayaṃ ca nyāyaḥ yathā vastu bhūte dharmmiṇi tathā avastu bhūte pi iti kaḥ viśeṣaḥ
tathā hi eka jñāna mātra vikalpaḥ eva
yathā ca hariṇa śirasi tena eka jñāna saṃsargi śṛṅgam upalabdham
śaśa śirasi api tena saha eka jñāna saṃsargi tva sambhāvanayā eva śṛṅgam niṣidhyate

original: tathā nīlādāvapariniṣṭhitanityānityabhāve kramākramau svadharmmiṇā sārdvaṃ ekajñānasaṃsargiṇau dṛṣṭau nitye 'pi yadi bhavataḥ /
analyzed: tathā nīla ādau apariniṣṭhita nitya anitya bhāve krama akramau svadharmmiṇā sārdvam eka jñāna saṃsargiṇau dṛṣṭau nitye yadi bhavataḥ

original: nityagrāhiṇā jñānena svadharmmiṇā nityena sahaiva gṛhyeyātāmiti sambhāvanayā /
analyzed: nitya grāhiṇā jñānena svadharmmiṇā nityena saha eva gṛhyeyātām iti sambhāvanayā
eka jñāna saṃsargi dvārakam eva pratiṣidhyate
katham punar etat nitya jñāne kramākramayoḥ asphuraṇam iti

original: yāvatā kramākramakroḍīkṛtameva nityaṃ vikalpayāma iti cet /
analyzed: yāvatā kramākrama kroḍīkṛtam eva nityam vikalpayāmaḥ iti ced
ataeva vādhaka avatāraḥ viparīta rūpa āropam antareṇa tasya vaiyarthyāt
kāla antareṇa eka rūpa tayā nitya tvam
kramākramau ca kṣaṇa dvaye bhinna rūpa tayā

original: tato nityatvasya kramākramikāryyaśakteśca parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatayā durvvāro virodha iti kathaṃ nitye kramākramayorantarbhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tatas nitya tvasya kramākrami kāryya śakteḥ ca paraspara parihāra sthita lakṣaṇa tayā durvvāraḥ virodhaḥ iti katham nitye krama akramayoḥ antarbhāvaḥ
anantarbhāvāt ca śuḍu anitya vikalpena dūrīkṛta krama akrama samāropeṇa katham ullekhaḥ
tatas ca pratiyogini nitye kalpyamāne
eka jñāna saṃsargi lakṣaṇa prāpte nitya upalabdhiḥ eva nitya virudvasya anupalabhyamānasya kramākramasya anupalabdhiḥ
tatas eva vā arthakriyā śakteḥ anupalabdheḥ
tasmāt vyāpaka viveki dharmmi upalabdhi tayā na vyāpaka anupalambha antarāt asya viśeṣaḥ
nanu etat avastu dharmmika upayogikaḥ tu adhiṣṭhāna tvāt pramāṇa vyavasthāyāḥ iti ced
kim idam bastu adhiṣṭhāna tvat nāma
kim paramparayā api vastunaḥ sakāśāt āgata tvam
atha vastuni kenacid ākāreṇa vyavahāra kāraṇa tvam
vastu bhūta dharmmi prativat vat vam bā

original: yadyādyaḥ pakṣastadā kramākramasyārthakriyāyāśca vyāptigrahaṇagocaravastuprativadvatvamapi na kṣīṇaṃ /
analyzed: yadi ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ tadā kramākramasya arthakriyāyāḥ ca vyāpti grahaṇa gocara vastu prativadva tvam api na kṣīṇam

original: na ca dvitīye 'pi pakṣe doṣaḥ sambhavati /
analyzed: na ca dvitīye pi pakṣe doṣaḥ sambhavati
kṣaṇabhaṅgi vastu sādhana upāya tvāt asya
na ca antimaḥ vikalpaḥ kalpyate
tasya eva nitya vikalpasya vastunaḥ dharmmi bhūtasya kramākramavat vāhya nitya upādāna śūnyatvena arthakriyāvat vāhya nitya upādāna śūnyatva prasādhanāt

original: paryyudāsavṛttyā budvisvabhāva bhūtā kṣaṇikākāre vastubhūte dharmmiṇi prativadvatvasambhavāt /
analyzed: paryyudāsa vṛttyā kṣaṇika ākāre vastu bhūte dharmmiṇi prativadva tva sambhavāt

original: ayameva nyāyo na vaktā bandhyāsutaścaitanyābhāvādityādau yojyaḥ /
analyzed: ayam eva nyāyaḥ na vaktā bandhyā sutaḥ caitanya abhāvāt ityādau yojyaḥ

original: etena yathā vṛkṣābhāvādityādyantarbhāvayituṃ śakyo na tathāyamiti trilocano 'pi nirastaḥ /
analyzed: etena yathā vṛkṣa abhāvāt ityādi antar bhāvayitum śakyaḥ na tathā ayam iti nirastaḥ
na ca krama ādi abhāvaḥ trayīm doṣa jātin na atikrāmati
abhāva dharmma tve pi āśraya asidvi doṣa parihārāt
yat tu anena pramāṇa antarāt nityānām asattva sidvau krama ādi virahasya abhāva dharmma tā na sidhyati iti uktam
tat vālasya api durabhidhānam
nityaḥ hi dharmmī
asattvam sādhyam
asya ca abhāva dharmma tvat nāma
asattva lakṣaṇa sva sādhya avinābhāvi tvam ucyate

original: tacca kramākrameṇa sattvasya vyāptisidvau sattvasya vyāpyasyābhāvena kramākramasya
analyzed: tat ca kramākrameṇa sattvasya vyāpti sidvau sattvasya vyāpyasya abhāvena kramākramasya

original: vyāpakasya viraho vyāptaḥ sidhyatītyabhāvadharmmatvaṃ prāgeva vidhyorvyāptisādhakāt
analyzed: vyāpakasya virahaḥ vyāptaḥ sidhyati iti abhāva dharmma tvam prāk eva vidhyoḥ vyāpti sādhakāt
pratyakṣāt anumāna ātmakāt vā pramāṇa antarāt sidvam iti na itaretarāśraya tva doṣaḥ

original: na ca sattāyāmivāsattāyāmapi tulyaprasaṅgo bhinna nyāyatvāt /
analyzed: na ca sattāyām iva asattāyām api tulya prasaṅgaḥ bhinna nyāya tvāt
vastu bhūtam hi tatra sādhyam sādhanam ca
vastu bhūtaḥ eva yujyate
vastunaḥ tu pratyakṣa anumānābhyām eva sidviḥ
tayoḥ abhāve niyamena āśraya asidviḥ iti yuktam

original: asattāsādhane tvavastudharmmā heturavastuni vikalpamātrasidve dharmmiṇi nāśrayāsidvidoṣeṇa dūṣayituṃ śakyaḥ /
analyzed: asattā sādhane tu avastu dharmmā hetuḥ avastuni vikalpa mātra sidve dharmmiṇi na āśraya asidvi doṣeṇa dūṣayitum śakyaḥ
tathā akṣaṇikasya krama yogapadyābhyām arthakriyā virodhaḥ sidhyati eva
tathā vikalpāt evā akṣaṇikaḥ virodhī sidvaḥ
vikalpa ullikhitaḥ ca asya svabhāvaḥ na aparaḥ iti api vyavaharttavyam
anyathā tad anuvādena kramākrama ādi rahita tva ādi niṣedha ādikam ayuktam
tat sva rūpasya an ullekhāt iti akṣaṇika śaśaviṣāṇa ādi śabda an uccāraṇa prasaṅgaḥ
asti ca
atas yathā pramāṇa abhāve pi vikalpa satvasya bandhyā suta ādeḥ saundaryya ādi niṣedhaḥ nurūpaḥ

original: tathā vikalpopanītasyaivākṣaṇika svarūpasya tat pratyanīkākāreṇa saha virodhavyavasthāyāṃ kīdṛśo doṣaḥ syāt /
analyzed: tathā vikalpa upanītasya eva akṣaṇika svarūpasya tad pratyanīka ākāreṇa saha virodha vyavasthāyām kīdṛśaḥ doṣaḥ syāt
yadi ca akṣaṇika anubhava abhāvāt virodha pratiṣedhaḥ
tarhi bandhyā putra ādi ananubhavāt eva saundaryya ādi niṣedhaḥ
nanu evam virodhasya apāramārthika tvam
tad dvāreṇa kṣaṇa bhaṅga sidviḥ api apāramārthikī syāt iti ced

original: na hi virodhonāma vastvantaraṃ kiñcit ubhayakoṭidattapādaṃ sambadvābhidhānamiṣyate 'smābhirupapadyate vā /
analyzed: na hi virodhaḥ nāma vastu antaram kiñcid ubhaya koṭi datta pādam sambadva abhidhānam iṣyate smābhiḥ upapadyate vā
yena eka sambandhinaḥ vastu tva abhāve paramārthikaḥ syāt
yathā tu iṣyate tathā pāramārthikaḥ eva
virudva abhimatayoḥ anyaḥ nya svarūpa parihāra mātram virodha arthaḥ
tat ca bhāva abhāvayoḥ pāramārthikam eva na bhāvaḥ bhāva rūpam āviśati

original: nāpyabhāvo bhāvarūpaṃ praviśatīti yo 'yamanayorasaṅkaraniyamaḥ sa eva pāramārthiko virodhaḥ /
analyzed: na api abhāvaḥ bhāva rūpam praviśati iti yaḥ yam anayoḥ asaṅkara niyamaḥ saḥ eva pāramārthikaḥ virodhaḥ
kāla antara eka rūpa tayā hi nitya tvam
kramākramau kṣaṇa dvaye pi bhinna rūpa tayā tatas nitya tva kramākrami kāryya kāraka tvayoḥ bhāva abhāva vat virodhaḥ sti eva

original: nanu nityatvakramayaugapadyavattvañca virudvau vidhūya nāparo virodhonāma /
analyzed: nanu nitya tva krama yaugapadyavat tvañca virudvau vidhūya nā aparaḥ virodhaḥ nāma
kasya vāstava tvam iti ced na

original: na hi dharmmāntarasya sambhavena virodhasya pāramārthikatvaṃ brūmaḥ /
analyzed: na hi dharmma antarasya sambhavena virodhasya pāramārthika tvam brūmaḥ

original: kintu virudvayordharmmayoḥ sadbhāve 'nyathā virodhanāmadharmmāntarasambhave 'pi yadi na virudvau dharmmau kva pāramārthikavirodhasadbhāvaḥ
analyzed: kintu virudvayoḥ dharmmayoḥ sadbhāve nyathā virodha nāma dharmma antara sambhave yadi na virudvau dharmmau kva pāramārthika virodha sadbhāvaḥ

original: virudvau ca dharmmau tāvataiva tāttviko virodhavyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: virudvau ca dharmmau tāvatā eva tāttvikaḥ virodha vyavahāraḥ
kim apareṇa pratijñā mātra sidvena virodha nāmnā vastu antareṇa
tat ayam pūrvvapakṣa saṃkṣepaḥ
nityan nā asti na vā pratīti viṣayaḥ tena āśraya asidva tā

original: hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
analyzed: hetoḥ sva anubhavasya ca kṣatiḥ atas kṣiptaḥ ca

original: śūnyaśca dvitayena sidhyati na vā sattāpi sattāyathā
analyzed: śūnyaḥ ca dvitayena sidhyati na vā sattā api sattā yathā
na unityena virodha sidviḥ asatā śakyā krama ādeḥ api iti
atra sidvānta saṃkṣepaḥ
dharmmasya
bādhā vidhi vyavakṛtiḥ kim iha asti no vā
kā api asti ced katham iyanti na dūṣaṇāni
na asti eva ced sva vacana pratirodha sidviḥ iti
tat evam nityam na krami kāryya kāri tva akrami kāryya kāri tva yogi paramārthaḥ
tatas ca sattā yuktam api nā eva paramārthataḥ

original: tataśca kṣaṇikākṣaṇikaparihāreṇa rāśyantarābhāvādakṣaṇikādvinivarttamānamidaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatva eva viśrāmyante na vyāptaṃ sidhyatīti sattvāt  #
analyzed: tatas ca kṣaṇika akṣaṇika parihāreṇa rāśi antara abhāvāt akṣaṇikāt vinivarttamānam idam sattvam kṣaṇika tve eva viśrāmyante na vyāptam sidhyati iti sattvāt  /
prakṛteḥ sarvva dharmmāṇām yat vodhāt muktiḥ iṣyate
saḥ eva tīrthya nirmmāthī kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ prasādhitaḥ
vipakṣe vādhanāt vetoḥ sādhya ātma tvam prasidhyati
tat sidvau dvividhā vyāpti sidviḥ atra abhidhīyate
iti vaidharmmya dṛṣṭānte vyatireka rūpa vyāptyā kṣaṇabhaṅga sidviḥ samāptā
kṛtiḥ iyam mahā paṇḍita ratnakīrtti pādānām
